verses.verse: Now these are the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%>. From the north <S%H6828><s%> end <S%H7097><s%> to the coast <S%H3027><s%> of the way <S%H1870><s%> of Hethlon <S%H2855><s%>, as one goeth <S%H935><s%> to Hamath <S%H2574><s%>, Hazar-enan <S%H2704><s%>, the border <S%H1366><s%> of Damascus <S%H1834><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>, to the coast <S%H3027><s%> of Hamath <S%H2574><s%>; for these are his sides <S%H6285><s%> east <S%H6921><s%> and west <S%H3220><s%>; a <S%H259><s%> portion for Dan <S%H1835><s%>.
And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> portion for Asher <S%H836><s%>.

And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> even unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> portion for Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>.

And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> portion for Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>.

And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> portion for Ephraim <S%H669><s%>.

And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Ephraim <S%H669><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> even unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> portion for Reuben <S%H7205><s%>.
And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, a <S%H259><s%> portion for Judah <S%H3063><s%>.

¶ And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, shall be the offering <S%H8641><s%> which ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> reeds in breadth <S%H7341><s%>, and in length <S%H753><s%> as one <S%H259><s%> of the other parts <S%H2506><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>: and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it.

The oblation <S%H8641><s%> that ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be of five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length <S%H753><s%>, and of ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth <S%H7341><s%>.

And for them, even for the priests <S%H3548><s%>, shall be this holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%>; toward the north <S%H6828><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length, and toward the west <S%H3220><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth <S%H7341><s%>, and toward the east <S%H6921><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth <S%H7341><s%>, and toward the south <S%H5045><s%> five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length <S%H753><s%>: and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

It shall be for the priests <S%H3548><s%> that are sanctified <S%H6942><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zadok <S%H6659><s%>; which have kept <S%H8104><s%> my charge <S%H4931><s%>, which went not astray <S%H8582><s%> when the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went astray <S%H8582><s%>, as the Levites <S%H3881><s%> went astray <S%H8582><s%>.

And this oblation <S%H8642><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> that is offered <S%H8641><s%> shall be unto them a thing most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> by the border <S%H1366><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>.

And over against <S%H5980><s%> the border <S%H1366><s%> of the priests <S%H3548><s%> the Levites <S%H3881><s%> shall have five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in length <S%H753><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> in breadth <S%H7341><s%>: all the length <S%H753><s%> shall be five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, and the breadth <S%H7341><s%> ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>.

And they shall not sell <S%H4376><s%> of it, neither exchange <S%H4171><s%>, nor alienate <S%H5674><s%> <S%H5674><s%> the firstfruits <S%H7225><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%>: for it is holy <S%H6944><s%> unto the LORD <S%H3068><s%>.

¶ And the five <S%H2568><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, that are left <S%H3498><s%> in the breadth <S%H7341><s%> over against <S%H6440><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>, shall be a profane <S%H2455><s%> place for the city <S%H5892><s%>, for dwelling <S%H4186><s%>, and for suburbs <S%H4054><s%>: and the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

And these shall be the measures <S%H4060><s%> thereof; the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and on the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, and the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>.

And the suburbs <S%H4054><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be toward the north <S%H6828><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, and toward the south <S%H5045><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, and toward the east <S%H6921><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>, and toward the west <S%H3220><s%> two hundred <S%H3967><s%> and fifty <S%H2572><s%>.

And the residue <S%H3498><s%> in length <S%H753><s%> over against <S%H5980><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion shall be ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> eastward <S%H6921><s%>, and ten <S%H6235><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> westward <S%H3220><s%>: and it shall be over against <S%H5980><s%> the oblation <S%H8641><s%> of the holy <S%H6944><s%> portion; and the increase <S%H8393><s%> thereof shall be for food <S%H3899><s%> unto them that serve <S%H5647><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%>.
And they that serve <S%H5647><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> shall serve <S%H5647><s%> it out of all the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>.

All the oblation <S%H8641><s%> shall be five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> by five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%>: ye shall offer <S%H7311><s%> the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%> foursquare <S%H7243><s%>, with the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>.

¶ And the residue <S%H3498><s%> shall be for the prince <S%H5387><s%>, on the one side and on the other of the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%>, and of the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, over against <S%H6440><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> of the oblation <S%H8641><s%> toward the east <S%H6921><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>, and westward <S%H3220><s%> over against <S%H6440><s%> the five <S%H2568><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> toward the west <S%H3220><s%> border <S%H1366><s%>, over against <S%H5980><s%> the portions <S%H2506><s%> for the prince <S%H5387><s%>: and it shall be the holy <S%H6944><s%> oblation <S%H8641><s%>; and the sanctuary <S%H4720><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> shall be in the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof.

Moreover from the possession <S%H272><s%> of the Levites <S%H3881><s%>, and from the possession <S%H272><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%>, being in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of that which is the prince's <S%H5387><s%>, between the border <S%H1366><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%> and the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, shall be for the prince <S%H5387><s%>.

As for the rest <S%H3499><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> shall have a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, Simeon <S%H8095><s%> shall have a <S%H259><s%> portion.
And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, Issachar <S%H3485><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion.
And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, Zebulun <S%H2074><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion.
And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>, from the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> unto the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, Gad <S%H1410><s%> a <S%H259><s%> portion.

And by the border <S%H1366><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, at the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> southward <S%H8486><s%>, the border <S%H1366><s%> shall be even from Tamar <S%H8559><s%> unto the waters <S%H4325><s%> of strife <S%H4808><s%> <S%H4809><s%> in Kadesh <S%H6946><s%>, and to the river <S%H5158><s%> toward the great <S%H1419><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%>.

This is the land <S%H776><s%> which ye shall divide <S%H5307><s%> by lot unto the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> for inheritance <S%H5159><s%>, and these are their portions <S%H4256><s%>, saith <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>.

¶ And these are the goings out <S%H8444><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> on the north <S%H6828><s%> side <S%H6285><s%>, four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> measures <S%H4060><s%>.

And the gates <S%H8179><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> shall be after the names <S%H8034><s%> of the tribes <S%H7626><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>: three <S%H7969><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%> northward <S%H6828><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Judah <S%H3063><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Levi <S%H3878><s%>.

And at the east <S%H6921><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>: and three <S%H7969><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%>; and one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Joseph <S%H3130><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Benjamin <S%H1144><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Dan <S%H1835><s%>.

And at the south <S%H5045><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%> measures <S%H4060><s%>: and three <S%H7969><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Simeon <S%H8095><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Issachar <S%H3485><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Zebulun <S%H2074><s%>.

At the west <S%H3220><s%> side <S%H6285><s%> four <S%H702><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> and five <S%H2568><s%> hundred <S%H3967><s%>, with their three <S%H7969><s%> gates <S%H8179><s%>; one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Asher <S%H836><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> gate <S%H8179><s%> of Naphtali <S%H5321><s%>.

It was round about <S%H5439><s%> eighteen <S%H8083><s%> <S%H6240><s%> thousand <S%H505><s%> measures: and the name <S%H8034><s%> of the city <S%H5892><s%> from that day <S%H3117><s%> shall be, The LORD is there <S%H3074><s%>.
